    • getCollectionAttributeCount

      public static int getCollectionAttributeCount​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection sfc, java.lang.String attributeName, java.lang.String attribute, org.opengis.filter.FilterFactory2 ff)
      Get the number of feature for which a given attribute is equal to a fixed value
      Parameters:
      sfc - input collection
      attributeName - field's name
      attribute - attribute's value
      ff - if a filter factory already exists (that may fast the process if count is made numerous times)
      Returns:
      the number of feature which attribute matches the given value
